title: Black Friday
description: Score amazing deals on the biggest shopping day of the year! Black Friday marks the official start of the holiday shopping season with incredible discounts, doorbuster sales, and limited-time offers. Whether you're shopping in-store or online, discover the best deals, learn shopping strategies, and find the perfect gifts for everyone on your list. Shop smart and save big!
howToCelebrate: Research deals and create a shopping list before heading out. Shop early for the best doorbuster deals, or stay home and shop online for convenience. Compare prices across different retailers to ensure you're getting the best deal. Set a budget and stick to it to avoid overspending. Consider shopping at small businesses on Small Business Saturday instead of just big retailers.
funFacts: Black Friday got its name because it's when retailers' books go from red (loss) to black (profit)
Over 165 million Americans shop on Black Friday weekend
The term 'Black Friday' was first used in 1961 in Philadelphia
Online Black Friday sales have grown by 20% annually since 2010
The average Black Friday shopper spends about $300

title: Cyber Monday
description: Shop from the comfort of your home on Cyber Monday! This online shopping extravaganza offers incredible deals on everything from electronics to clothing, making it the perfect day to complete your holiday shopping. Discover exclusive online discounts, learn about safe online shopping practices, and find the best deals without leaving your couch. Happy shopping!
howToCelebrate: Shop online from the comfort of your home for the best Cyber Monday deals. Sign up for retailer newsletters to get exclusive discount codes. Use price comparison tools to find the best deals across multiple websites. Take advantage of free shipping offers and extended return policies. Shop securely by using trusted websites and secure payment methods.
funFacts: Cyber Monday was created in 2005 by the National Retail Federation
It's the biggest online shopping day of the year in the United States
Cyber Monday sales have grown from $484 million in 2005 to over $10 billion today
The term was coined because people returned to work and shopped online on Monday
Mobile shopping accounts for over 50% of Cyber Monday traffic

title: National Small Business Saturday
description: Shop small and support local communities on National Small Business Saturday! This important shopping day encourages consumers to support small, local businesses in their communities. From family-owned restaurants to boutique stores, discover the unique products and personalized service that small businesses offer while helping to strengthen local economies.
howToCelebrate: Visit local small businesses in your community and make purchases. Share your favorite small businesses on social media to help promote them. Leave positive reviews for local businesses you love. Attend small business events or markets in your area. Consider starting your own small business or supporting a friend's entrepreneurial venture.
funFacts: Small Business Saturday was created by American Express in 2010
Small businesses create 2 out of every 3 new jobs in America
For every $100 spent at a local business, $68 stays in the community
Small businesses employ nearly half of all private sector employees
Small Business Saturday has generated over $120 billion in sales since its inception

title: Small Business Saturday
description: Support local entrepreneurs and shop small on Small Business Saturday! This special day encourages consumers to support small and local businesses in their communities. From unique boutiques to family restaurants, small businesses are the backbone of local economies and offer personalized service and unique products you won't find anywhere else.
howToCelebrate: Shop at local small businesses instead of big chain stores. Discover new restaurants, boutiques, and service providers in your area. Share photos and reviews of small businesses on social media to help them gain visibility. Buy gift cards from local businesses for holiday presents. Recommend your favorite small businesses to friends and family.

title: National Thrift Shop Day
description: Hunt for treasures and shop sustainably on National Thrift Shop Day! Thrift shopping is not only budget-friendly but also environmentally conscious, giving pre-loved items a second life. From vintage clothing to unique home decor, thrift shops offer endless possibilities for finding one-of-a-kind items while supporting charitable causes.
howToCelebrate: Explore local thrift shops, consignment stores, and vintage boutiques. Look for unique clothing, books, furniture, and household items. Donate items you no longer need to support thrift stores' charitable missions. Share your thrift finds and styling tips on social media. Learn about the environmental benefits of buying secondhand.
funFacts: Thrift shopping keeps millions of pounds of clothing out of landfills each year
The average American throws away 81 pounds of clothing annually
Thrift stores support various charitable causes and community programs
Vintage and secondhand fashion has become increasingly popular with younger generations
Shopping secondhand can save up to 90% compared to buying new

title: National Shopping Day
description: Celebrate the joy of shopping and retail therapy on National Shopping Day! Whether you're hunting for bargains, treating yourself to something special, or finding the perfect gifts for loved ones, shopping can be both fun and rewarding. Discover new stores, support local businesses, and enjoy the experience of finding exactly what you're looking for.
howToCelebrate: Explore new shopping destinations and discover unique stores. Set a budget and treat yourself to something you've been wanting. Shop for holiday gifts early to avoid the rush. Compare prices and look for the best deals. Share your shopping finds and favorite stores on social media.

From clearance sales to coupon clipping, discover the art of smart shopping and learn how to stretch your dollar while still getting quality items you love.
howToCelebrate: Search for the best deals and discounts at your favorite stores. Use coupons and cashback apps to maximize savings. Compare prices across different retailers before making purchases. Visit outlet stores and clearance sections for great bargains. Share your best bargain finds and money-saving tips on social media.
